name.zh: 双拉链实用斜挎包（海军蓝）

description.en: A compact utility crossbody bag featuring dual zip compartments for organized carry. Designed with an adjustable strap and structured body—ideal for phone, wallet, passport, and daily essentials for commuting or travel. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, pocket layout, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 双拉链分仓设计的实用斜挎包，收纳更有条理。配可调节肩带与挺括包型，适合放置手机、钱包、护照与随身小物，通勤与旅行皆宜。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zippers: Dual zippers, standard or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：双拉链分仓（常规或可选 YKK）
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/挂钩/D 环等（可定制）

en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, pocket layout, logo, lining, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 20–26cm × 高 14–18cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身、通勤、旅行收纳
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo、内里、拉链五金、包装
